title: New: Grace Lightman – Vapour Trails
body:
This might be the most beautiful debut of the year, courtesy of London’s **Grace Lightman** (formerly of psych-rock outfit The Hypnotic Eye).

_Vapour Trails_ is a lush ballad, heart-wrenchingly honest and painstakingly perfect in production and vocal delivery; in truth, my feeble words struggle to do justice to the allure of this track. Check it out below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
